text: was a Japanese politician. He represented the Yamanashi Prefecture electoral district and later Yamanashi District No. 3 in the House of Representatives from 1993 until 2002. He was Governor of Yamanashi Prefecture from 2007 until 2015. Yokouchi was born in Nirasaki, Yamanashi. Yokouchi died on 21 April 2020, aged 78.知事を２期８年 横内正明元知事が死去 ７８歳 ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Politicians from Yamanashi Prefecture
title: Shōmei Yokouchi
